author: PR.com
title: SGS Celebrates the Opening of Wireless Laboratory in San Diego
text:
SGS Celebrates the Opening of Wireless Laboratory in San Diego
SGS celebrates opening of a new, expanded wireless laboratory in San Diego, California.
San Diego, CA, August 28, 2015 --( PR.com )-- SGS is hosting an open house event to celebrate the inauguration of its new wireless conformance laboratory in San Diego, California, on Thursday August 27, from 4-6pm.
Conformance Testing Wireless Laboratory
Replacing older, smaller facilities, SGS’s new 17,800 sq. ft. facility consolidates all conformance testing for the wireless industry into one 6,000 sq. ft. laboratory. This investment allows the company to increase not only laboratory capacity, but also its capabilities. In addition, to support product development and testing, the San Diego facility has four secure client meeting rooms, with free access to a conference room, break room, lobby and prototype room.
To further improve access to SGS wireless conformance services, this new facility is just a half mile from the company’s OTA (over-the-air) facility.
Join SGS to celebrate the official opening of this new facility. Find out more about the wireless laboratory open house (http://www.sgsgroup.us.com/en/Local/USA/Events/2015/08/Wireless-Laboratory-Open-House.aspx).
About SGS Wireless Testing Services
SGS provides complete solutions for wireless testing and certification (http://www.sgs.com/~/media/Global/Documents/Brochures/SGS%20CTS%20EE%20Wireless%20brochure%20EN%20A6%202014%20US.pdf) with advanced testing facilities in Europe, North America and Asia. The company’s competence centers offer a highly experienced and knowledgeable network of experts, committed to innovation and improvement, giving you the assurance clients need in an increasingly regulated world.
As a member of the GCF (Global Certification Forum) and PTCRB (PCS Type Certification Review Board), SGS takes an active role in global technology and its engineers are experts in their fields of knowledge, delivering the most complete solution for telecommunications testing and certification.
For further information, please contact an SGS representative.
LinkedIn: http://www.linkedin.com/company/sgs-consumer-goods-&-retail
SGS is the world’s leading inspection, verification, testing and certification company. SGS is recognized as the global benchmark for quality and integrity. With more than 80,000 employees, SGS operates a network of over 1,650 offices and laboratories around the world.
